Document.p: Coal fired power stations produce packets of electricity which are placed onto connected power lines.
Power lines connect at the top left corner of the station, transport connects to the next possition in. See the example.

The efficiency of the conversion of coal to electricity increases with increasing tech level - when the station is built. You may want to demolish an old station and replace it with a newer, more efficient one, when your tech level has increased by a significant amount.
